ygData.msgSnippet: Gary, Here are some tips, use 10% roast as per Guinness, about 10% flaked oats, 10% crystal and the remainder a good English pale ale malt. Guiness hops at 40

Subject: [TRUB] Re: Oatmeal Stout
Content-Type: text/plain

Gary,
Here are some tips, use 10% roast as per Guinness, about 
10% flaked oats, 10% crystal and the remainder a good 
English pale ale malt. Guiness hops at 40 IBU but most 
stouts are in the 32 - 35 range. Mash at about 152 to get a 
well balanced wort.
Keith
On Tue, 13 Oct 1998 17:23:21 -0400 garytolley@juno.com 
wrote:

> Trubbers,
>

> anyone have one they would like to share?
> 
> Regards,
>
